Text:
Beskrivningen var nog lite konstig :P Kolla i .NFO-filen istället.


The description was a bit strange :P Check out the .NFO-file instead.
Please someone translate nfo to English, please! Thank you.  Which language is that?  Anyone know?

1. Visit http://www.microsoft.com/emea/office2007beta/9 to register and get a registration code.  
  2. Fill in the needed information to register as a user. 
3. Shortly you will get a special code you can activate your version with.
4. Mounta/Burn and put in the CD. If it doesn't start, open the CD via "this computer" and doubleclick on the unit where you have MS office on. 
 5. Now the installation starts and you will be asked to fill the code key you got earlier.   
6. Follow instructions on screen, and the program will be installed on your computer. 

/Havn't tried this so i have no idea if any of the text in the installation or something is in Swedish or if you can read it. If it is in Swedish - use your imagination ....
The trial versions hosted in the test drive contain most of the functionality of the regular versions, but saving and printing documents is not enabled.

Visit https://profile.microsoft.com/RegSysProfileCenter/wizard.aspx?wizid=dc5ef56d-9bd8-4644-a645-aa1b7d21fad4&lcid=1033 for the English version of the wizard.

Or you can click on the link provided above. Look for the part "lcid=xxxx" and change xxxx to 1033 (which is en-us).

Full version kommer i november.
Finns tillgänglig för privatpersoner i butik först efter nyår.
